entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
